The tag `<geometrical_sets>` groups all geometrical sets together.

For brevity, in the following project file snippet all the other tags like
`<type>`, `<prefix>`, `<suffix>`, `<meshes>`, and `<variables>` are omitted.

```xml
<output>
    ...
    <geometrical_sets>
        <geometrical_set>
            ...
        </geometrical_set>
        <geometrical_set>
            ...
        </geometrical_set>
    </geometrical_sets>
    ...
</output>
```
